site_name: Millbrook Park(Former Inglis Barracks)Mill Hill EastLondonNW7 1PX
description: Non material amendment to planning permission 15/06898/RMA dated  for `Reserved matters application seeking approval of appearance, landscaping, layout and scale for Phase 4c of the Mill Hill East development pursuant to Outline planning permission reference H/04017/09 dated: 22/9/2011, involving the erection of 89 units consisting of 12 x 1 bedroom apartments, 24 x 2 bedroom apartments, 16 x 3 bedroom houses, 24 x 4 bedroom houses, 13 x 5 bedroom houses together with details to discharge the requirements of: Conditions 5 (Reserved matter details), 8 (Affordable housing), 26 (Access points), 27 (Details of Estate Roads), 29 (Internal access roads), 32 (Shared Footways/ Cycleways), 35 (Petrol/oil interceptors), 48 (Open space), 52 (Children's playing space), 69 (Noise from Plant), 70 (Homes standards), 80 (Sustainable homes), 83 (Grey water/rainwater recycling) and 85 (Green/brown roofs). Amendments include change of balcony balustrades to blocks A and B from glass panelling to metal railings
